<div type="collation" xml:id="Unit_C12"> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C12"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__1"/>"Dear, dear <seg xml:id="C12_app2-fMS_start"/> Elizabeth" <seg xml:id="C12_app2-fMS_end"/> I <seg xml:id="C12_app4-fMS_start"/> exclaimed <seg xml:id="C12_app4-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__2"/>when I had read her <seg xml:id="C12_app6-fMS_start"/> letter"–I <seg xml:id="C12_app6-fMS_end"/> will write <seg xml:id="C12_app8-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__3"/>instantly <seg xml:id="C12_app8-fMS_end"/> and relieve them from the <seg xml:id="C12_app10-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__4"/>great pain <seg xml:id="C12_app10-fMS_end"/> they must feel." <seg xml:id="C12_app12-fMS_start"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__5"/>I wrote, and this exertion greatly <lb n="c56-0065__main__6"/>fatigued <seg xml:id="C12_app12-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C12_app13-fMS_start"/> me <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13438"/>; <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13438"/> b <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13441"/> <mdel>y</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13445"/>ut <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13445"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13441"/> <seg xml:id="C12_app13-fMS_end"/> my convalescence <seg xml:id="C12_app15-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0065__main__d5e13449"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0065__main__d5e13451">was</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0065.01"/><lb n="c56-0065__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0065__left_margin__d5e13460"/>had <seg xml:id="C12_app15-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C12_app19-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13475"/><mod eID="c56-0065__main__d5e13467"/> regularly–in <seg xml:id="C12_app19-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__8"/>another fortnight I was able to <lb n="c56-0065__main__9"/>leave my chamber. <seg xml:id="C12_app21-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0065__main__10"/> <metamark function="separate">______</metamark> <lb n="c56-0066__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0066.05" unit="tei:head"/> Chap. 8 <shi rend="sup"></shi> <seg xml:id="C12_app21-fMS_end"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0066.05"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__2"/>one of my first duties on my recovery was <lb n="c56-0066__main__3"/>to introduce Clerval to the <seg xml:id="C12_app23-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13514"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13516"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13516"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13522"/>several <seg xml:id="C12_app23-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13522"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13514"/>professors of <lb n="c56-0066__main__4"/>the university. <seg xml:id="C12_app25-fMS_start"/> And in doing <seg xml:id="C12_app25-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C12_app26-fMS_start"/> this <seg xml:id="C12_app26-fMS_end"/> I <seg xml:id="C12_app28-fMS_start"/> under <lb n="c56-0066__main__5"/>went <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13530">torments</del> <seg xml:id="C12_app28-fMS_end"/> a kind of rough <seg xml:id="C12_app30-fMS_start"/> usage <lb n="c56-0066__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13536">that</del> <seg xml:id="C12_app30-fMS_end"/> ill <seg xml:id="C12_app32-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13539">befitten</del> befitt <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13542"/> <mdel>ed</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13546"/>ing <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13546"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13542"/> <seg xml:id="C12_app32-fMS_end"/> the wounds <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13550"/>that <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13550"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__7"/>my mind had sustained. Ever since the <lb n="c56-0066__main__8"/>fatal <seg xml:id="C12_app34-fMS_start"/> night – <seg xml:id="C12_app34-fMS_end"/> the end of my <seg xml:id="C12_app36-fMS_start"/> labours &<lb n="c56-0066__main__9"/>the <seg xml:id="C12_app36-fMS_end"/> beginning of my <seg xml:id="C12_app38-fMS_start"/> misfortunes <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13560"> <unclear>(</unclear> </del> <seg xml:id="C12_app38-fMS_end"/> I had <lb n="c56-0066__main__10"/>conceived a violent antipathy even to <lb n="c56-0066__main__11"/>the name of <seg xml:id="C12_app40-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13569"/> <mdel>Ch</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13573">Chemistry</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13576"/>Natural <seg xml:id="C12_app40-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C12_app41-fMS_start"/> Philosophy <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13576"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13569"/> . <seg xml:id="C12_app41-fMS_end"/> When I was <w ana="start"/>other<lb n="c56-0066__main__12"/>wise<w ana="end"/> quite restored to <seg xml:id="C12_app43-fMS_start"/> health <seg xml:id="C12_app43-fMS_end"/> the sight of <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13587"/>a <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13587"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__13"/>Chemical instrument <seg xml:id="C12_app45-fMS_start"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0066.02"/>brought on <lb n="c56-0066__main__14"/>again <delSpan anchor="c56-0066.02"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13599"/>renewed <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13599"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0066.01"/> <seg xml:id="C12_app45-fMS_end"/> all <seg xml:id="C12_app47-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13604"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13606"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13606"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13612"/>the agony of <seg xml:id="C12_app47-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C12_app50-fMS_start"/> symtoms. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13622">Lo</del> <seg xml:id="C12_app50-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0066__main__15"/>Henry saw <seg xml:id="C12_app52-fMS_start"/> this <seg xml:id="C12_app52-fMS_end"/> and had <seg xml:id="C12_app54-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13628"/> <mdel>p</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0066__main__d5e13632">packed up</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13635"/>removed <sga-add eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13635"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13628"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__16"/>all my <seg xml:id="C12_app54-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C12_app78-fMS_start"/> but <seg xml:id="C12_app78-fMS_end"/> not guessing <lb n="c56-0066__main__27"/>the real <seg xml:id="C12_app80-fMS_start"/> cause <seg xml:id="C12_app80-fMS_end"/> he attributed <seg xml:id="C12_app82-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c56-0066__main__d5e13733"/> <mdel>to</mdel> <mdel>it</mdel> <anchor xml:id="c56-0066.04"/><lb n="c56-0066__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13745"/>my feelings <sga-add eID="c56-0066__left_margin__d5e13745"/><mod eID="c56-0066__main__d5e13733"/><lb n="c56-0066__main__28"/>to <seg xml:id="C12_app82-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C12_app89-fMS_start"/> desire <seg xml:id="C12_app89-fMS_end"/> as I evidently <seg xml:id="C12_app91-fMS_start"/> saw <seg xml:id="C12_app91-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c56-0067__main__4"/>of drawing <seg xml:id="C12_app93-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13788">friend</del> me out. <seg xml:id="C12_app93-fMS_end"/>

<seg xml:id="C12_app95-fMS_start"/> please <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13813">and</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13816">me</del> <seg xml:id="C12_app95-fMS_end"/> & he <seg xml:id="C12_app97-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c56-0067__main__8"/><mod sID="c56-0067__main__d5e13821"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13823">tortured</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0067.04"/><lb n="c56-0067__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0067__left_margin__d5e13832"/>tormented <seg xml:id="C12_app97-fMS_end"/>

I writhed <lb n="c56-0067__main__13"/>under his words, yet dared not <seg xml:id="C12_app107-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C12_app108-fMS_start"/> shew <lb n="c56-0067__main__14"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0067__main__d5e13887">my</del> <seg xml:id="C12_app108-fMS_end"/> the pain I felt.
